clang-analyzer-optin.osx.cocoa.localizab.description:
Description

clang-analyzer-optin.osx.cocoa.localizability.EmptyLocalizationContextChecker
Check that NSLocalizedString macros include a comment for context.
The
clang-analyzer-optin.osx.cocoa.localizability.EmptyLocalizationContextChecker
check is an alias, please see
Clang Static Analyzer Available Checkers
for more information.
clang-analyzer-optin.osx.cocoa.localizab.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
